heading: Projekti 3: REST API
target: Create a REST API for your app (for example music / sports / project database)*
tasks: Your API should have *atleast 5 routes*, defined in table below (5 x 1 = 5 p.)
Use Mongoose in your API DB queries  (5 x 1 = 5 p.)
Test your API with POSTMAN or CURL
Publish your app in Heroku (Linkittyy ulkoiselle sivustolle.), Vercel (Linkittyy ulkoiselle sivustolle.) or similar hosting service. ( 2 p.)
Source code should be found in GitHub. Comment your code! Provide README in the repository with URL:s and other info  ( 3 p.)
BONUS. If you wish you can build a simple front-end for your API using HTML/CSS/Bootstrap etc. Publish this in Netlify. ( 3 p.)
